entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #282
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36435: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #281
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38171: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #280

Closed

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #277
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-36435: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #278
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-38171: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #279

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: clean up unused throw helpers #93948
    9.0.0
  • Metric description for `http.client.request.duration` does not match the spec #93945
  • [NativeAOT] ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: tls_CurrentThread #93942
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: WASM DotnetHostBuilder assembly loading progress callback #93941
  • Remove net6.0;net7.0 from System.Numerics.Tensors #93939
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] No way to dll export variables? #93936
  • Consider allowing user-defined PrintMembers via extension method for sealed types #93934
  • Optimizing code pattern involving k-register #93932
  • Blazor WASM not aborting socket on HttpClient cancellation #93930
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `Remove` method to `PriorityQueue` #93925
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend LoggingGenerator to support scopes #93924
    Future
  • [mono] build fails with newer compiler on windows #93922
    9.0.0
  • How to set GCConserveMemory? #93914
  • Vector128 intrinsic causing crashes on ARM platform. #93912
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #93927
  • Please provide guidance on how to use DllImportResolver with dlopen on Linux (xref #11901) #93911
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 41 Regressions on 10/18/2023 3:03:02 PM #93926
  • Application hangs on GC under dotnet 6.0 in linux #93909
  • Access to the port 'ttyS0' is denied #93908
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\CollectionCountTest\\CollectionCountTest.cmd #93905
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT completely broken on 8.0 branch #93900

Closed

  • The JsonIgnore is being ignored causing property collisions with PropertyNameCaseInsensitive set to true #93903
    8.0.x
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #88305
    9.0.0
  • Updated RID Plan #83246
    8.0.0
  • Remove usage of InterceptorsPreview feature after updating to 8.0 RC2 SDK #92248
    8.0.0
  • Backlog Clearing Strategy for System.Buffers, System.Numerics, System.Numerics.Tensors, System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77119
    8.0.0
  • Consider adding "no new features" note to low churn libraries #63401
    8.0.0
  • Future of ISerializable, Serializable attribute and IDeserializationCallback interface #70208
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_EnableAvx512F=0 does not disable Vector512.IsHardwareAccelerated in WSL #90598
    8.0.0
  • GetFromJsonAsync does not respect MaxResponseContentBufferSize property of HttpClient #71763
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 slight different result in DateTime.UnixEpoch.AddSeconds(double) #93937
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #93904
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/int64/superlong/superlong_d/superlong_d.dll #93710
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test.GetAsync_AllowedSSLVersion_Succeeds(acceptedProtocol: Ssl3, requestOnlyThisProtocol: True) #53404
    Future
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests failing in CI runs #90521
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement INumber<T> for vector types and operator interfaces for matrix types. #90781
  • [API Proposal]: File.AppendAllBytes #84532
    Future
  • SafeEvpPKeyHandle abort on macOS #93883
    9.0.0
  • Enable Cors not working as expected #93910
  • Detect the .NET core version at runtime #568
    Future
  • Add a memory budget to the GC #10564
    Future
  • Is there a way to hot reload a particular .wasm module after the runtime already initialised? #91539
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10014): The system detected an invalid pointer address in attempting to use a pointer argument in a call #92464
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move JIT's clang-tidy flags into configuration files and add a root clang-tidy config that disables all checks. #93951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: fix failing no-trimming test #93950
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add support for UnsafeAccessorKind.FieldOffset (#45152) #93946
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix the perf issue in TensorPrimitives.MinMaxCore #93944
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Suppress few more MSVC warnings #93923
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Disabling two socket tests #93916
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription test to validate version #93913
    area-System.Runtime
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Test #93906
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93902
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT: Log more info to help debug CI #93899
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads

Merged

  • JIT: Allow initializing blocks without jump targets #93928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add pod for System.Buffers #93947
    area-Meta
  • Remove use of InterceptorsPreview feature setting now that we build with RC2 #93940
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Honor JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive in property name conflict resolution. #93933
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Honor JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive in property name conflict resolution. #93935
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix perf pipeline runs #93888
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Implement API AppendAllBytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix bug introduced by recent throw helper block changes #93897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Trigger workload integrity check #93898
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads
  • [RISC-V] Test NFloat.IsNegative against its native type equivalent #93734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Change OpenSslVersion to check for OpenSSL before attempting to determine openssl version #93886
    area-System.Security
  • Fix GitHub_93597 test build #93833
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Disable not-yet-implemented EnC assertion #93864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tests] Disable System.Reflection and System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel tests #93853
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up GenTreeCallFlags, remove INLINE_DATA define #93830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku

Updated

  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Use deferred evaluation in ReadOnlyDictionary.Key/Value collections. #93870
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93875
    area-VM-threading-mono
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #93874
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't use File.OpenWrite when trying to overwrite a file in illink/wasm build tasks #93854
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.1
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Pass/receive SIMD arguments by value. #93794
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Unblock subsequent requests when an async over sync Dns call runs for too long #92863
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [linux-bionic] Skip failing NTLM tests #92830
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Does dotnet/runtimelab want to host WIT code gen issues #2409

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automate workload drop creation to streamline insertion process #36442
  • `dotnet --info` should not cause a worklog log to be emitted #36441
  • ECDsa.TrySignData(...) returns true, with bytes written == 64 for null values #36439
  • `dotnet tool restore` installing wrong version specified in `dotnet-tools.json` #36434
  • dotnet restore crashes with internal CLR error #36417

Closed

  • Disabling first run welcome message? #10411
    Discussion
  • Referencing a .net7.0-windows project from a net7.0 project when ReferenceOutputAssembly == false results in build error #36352

PullRequests

Created

  • update change to test for deadlocks for packageInstall #36443
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve rude edit and error handling #36401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce test timeout to speed up timeouts. #36090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update change to test for deadlocks in `packageInstall` #36393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra diag output #36115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Stabilize package versions #36433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • add packagesprops template #36387
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • APICompat & GenAPI clean-up #36353
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open issue: nullability analysis of collection expressions #7626

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow ref struct to implement interfaces #7625

Merged

  • Queue topic for nullability analysis of collection expressions #7627

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Completion doesn't show extension methods if there is a property with the same name #70537
  • LSP: Support `textDocument/semanticTokens/full` and `textDocument/semanticTokens/full/delta` #70536
  • A code fix for CS8767 (nullability doesn't match) and friends would be awesome #70535
  • CSharpImplementExplicitlyCodeRefactoringProvider threw and exception and crashed #70534
  • Roslyn tries to override inherited methods from a record in a class #70530

Closed

  • VS crahses on typing a new type constraint in complex generic code #57763
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34224.107 #70544
  • Duplicate build errors are not collapsed in the error list #70044

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flakeyness in extract method test #70543
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge pull request #70347 into 17.8 #70542
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include syntax error in Hot Reload diagnostics reported to dotnet watch #70540
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of bugs found in "use collection expression" #70539
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Attempt to work around GitHub Copilot breaking integration tests #70532
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2300362 #70526
  • Cherry pick: Fix classification layering #70541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70533
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unnecessary casts. #70504
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull postcondition on by-value parameters #70414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clean up inheritance hierarchy for CSharpAttributeData/VisualBasicAttributeData. #70519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `error.type` attribute value of `http.server.request.duration` metric #51620
  • Streaming Rendering Renders Poor Errors if an Exception Happens After Streaming Started #51619
  • Enhanced Navigation Silently Ignores Fetch Network Errors #51618
  • Hosting Diagnostics risk double counting of events #51617
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #51614
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #51613
  • [Blazor] Accept the `blazor.web.js` startup options format in `blazor.{server|webassembly}.js` #51611
  • Add the kestrelHttpPort port ASP.NET template flag to more templates #51609
  • MetadataTypeAttribute still not supported in Blazor client side ,wasm, workaround #39938 is not working #51604
  • [Blazor] Enable Blazor apps running inside of ASP.NET Core to be trimmed and AoT compiled #51598
  • I was displaying a bunch large text files inside blazor, this's what's happened #51597
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51595
  • Navigation in Interactive Server Components is broken unless Routes are Server Interactive #51594

Closed

  • Problems configuring Kestrel in IIS #51608
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    .NET 9 Planning
  • PersistComponentState inconsistent behavior #51583
  • Blazor 8 PersistentComponentState and Enhanced Navigation #51610
  • Enable Cors not working as expected #51599
  • Provide a more intelligent routing fallback for Blazor apps that only falls back if the route matches a routable component #42003
  • [Blazor] Cannot publish Release-sized apps any more #25924
    Backlog
  • Cookie based authentication in .NET 6 Core API using Identity #51556
  • Blazor: Page scroll is incorrectly reset after a page refresh #51112
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Difference in pattern matching between MVC and endpoints #51421
  • Blazor [SupplyParameterFromQuery] not usable in OnInitialized() when navigating [dotnet 8.rc2] #51398
  • Source Generator for SignalR Client #51602
  • Possibly flawed implementation around UseStaticFiles #34159
    Backlog
  • Intercepting Blazor page events. #30115
    Backlog
  • Support Razor Component endpoints for UseExceptionHandler #50287
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor - (client side) the "guid" Route Constraint forces the component execute for every single click #19008
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #51558

PullRequests

Created

  • Add info about nightly builds table, plus .deb/.rpm installers #51621
    area-infrastructure
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Add table to README with links to nightly builds #51534
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51589
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Use markup for documentation #51567
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51593
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview1
  • add data-nosnippet attribute to MainLayout razor pages #51543
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 23523.1 #51588
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #51532
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51582
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • How to debug memory leak that is not clear on dotnet-dump? #4139
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Restore error message when the heap isn't walkable #4361

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assigning "{x:Type ImageButton}" instead of "ImageButton" to the TargetType property of a Trigger of an ImageButton style breaks build #18324
  • CATextLayer text is blurry on Catalyst and iOS #18285
  • Application freezes when phone font size (or anything affecting UI) changes while app is running. #18284
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS, Mac] The editor placeholder can't able to changed, It's default placed at center #18282
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] App crashes with Picker in FlexLayout in Grid with Auto RowDefinition #18278
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor Windows App does not work with Native AOT #17713
  • Can't build only one target in a multi target maui project #17994
  • Search bar log file like in Chrome #18175
  • [WinUI] The app crashes when dragging Slider thumb near the end #17974
    .NET 8 GA
  • Element not found. Exception. #18201
  • iOS remote build fails when artifact folder is changed #18226
  • Looking for MAUI Mock Package like Xamarin.Forms.Mocks #18280
  • Code Signing Error with Xcode 15+ #18231
  • Border controls margin property only seems to affect right and bottom #17982
  • AllowExternalDrop should default to false on the Blazor WebView controls (Wpf,WinForms) #8478
    Backlog
  • Flyout Page: Tap gesture not working on iOS in split mode when setting FlyoutOverlapsDetailsInPopoverMode to false #16246

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] [Templates] Remove get-task-allow entitlement from Templates #18323
  • Ensure templates create a proper AppID #18322
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] Ensure that viewport calculations for iOS ScrollView account for content insets #18321
  • [ci] Remove DeviceTests on iOS13.7 add Android 33 #18320
  • [release/7.0.3xx-sr9] [net7.0] Update aspnet versions #18319
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Activate enforcement of CA1859 in Core #18315
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #18314
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    community ✨

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] API Doc improvements to fix online browser warnings #18311
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2] Make sure to account for a null AppWindow #18313

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using dotnet ef 7 tool from with net8 #32155
  • Convert_regular_column_of_temporal_table_to_sparse failing #32154
  • Stop escaping Unicode characters unnecessarily in relational JSON #32152
  • Update attach entity with Json column in EF #32151
  • Investigate compatibility with the new SQL Server native JSON type #32150
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The instance of entity type 'AccountsLabels' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{AccountsTreeEntityId: 65, LabelId: 25}' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #32149
  • EF8 - Regression on Contains query when column collation is not default DB collation #32147

Closed

  • Improve RuntimeModel building performance #31142
    MQ
  • ForeignKeys, Keys and Indexes on Property should have a strong order defined #19361
    MQ
  • Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer #31117
    Backlog
  • Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32062
    9.0.0
  • EF Core type inheritance to be ignored in OnModelCreating #32145
  • Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32023
    9.0.0
  • UseLazyLoadingProxies is not effect on AddPooledDbContextFactory #32130

PullRequests

Created

  • Attempt to fix 32154 #32157
  • Add a logo #32156

Merged

  • Use OrderedDictionary or Dictionary instead of SortedDictionary in RuntimeModel #32124
  • Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer #32099
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #32110
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.2 to 1.10.3 #32139
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32142
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32141
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [main] Fix to #32062 - Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32102
  • [main] Fix to #32023 - Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32094

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.58.0 #32140
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Component governance] Update Azure.Identity dependency #32108
    blocked
